name: KGEAR GC3
headline: Ultra-compact 3-inch architectural coaxial speaker
description: A palm-sized coaxial loudspeaker that disappears into ceilings or millwork while filling intimate spaces with open, articulate sound.
story: GC3 is designed for projects where the loudspeaker must visually vanish but still deliver coherent coverage. The compact ABS enclosure and spring terminals keep installation quick, while the coaxial motor maintains phase alignment across a wide seating area for background music and speech.
definition: 3-inch coaxial architectural loudspeaker with 130-degree coverage for discreet ceiling or wall mounting.
specs: Transducers: 3" coax woofer with 0.5" mylar tweeter
Spring terminal connector, ABS enclosure, white or black options
Dimensions 116 x 100 x 58 mm, weight 0.4 kg

lifestyle.alt: GC3 loudspeaker shown at an angle with its front grille
GC3 mounted on a wall bracket in a small interior
Front-on view of the GC3 coaxial driver and baffle
Close-up of the GC3 grille texture and frame detail

name: KGEAR GC5
headline: 5.25-inch coaxial for lounges and villas
description: A shallow 5.25-inch coaxial loudspeaker that brings lounge-weight bass and smooth highs to villas, suites and softly lit hospitality rooms.
story: GC5 steps up from micro-format solutions with a larger coaxial driver that pairs naturally with GS subwoofers. Its wide 130-degree coverage and 80 W power rating make it ideal for distributed systems where you want even playback and a bit more low-end comfort in each zone.
definition: Shallow 5.25-inch coaxial loudspeaker with 130-degree coverage for premium residential and hospitality spaces.
specs: Transducers: 5.25" coax ferrite woofer with 0.75" titanium tweeter
Spring terminal connector, ABS enclosure, white or black finishes
Dimensions 196 x 179 x 75 mm, weight 1.08 kg

lifestyle.alt: GC5 loudspeaker shown in three-quarter view
Detail view of the GC5 enclosure and front baffle
Rear view of the GC5 showing spring terminal connectors
GC5 grille viewed close up to highlight the finish

name: KGEAR GC6T
headline: 6.5-inch coaxial with 70/100 V transformer
description: A 6.5-inch transformer-equipped coaxial loudspeaker that runs along corridors and public spaces, voicing music evenly on every floor.
story: GC6T is built for distributed mono and stereo lines in commercial buildings. Selectable power taps let you balance levels across long 70/100 V runs, while the 6.5-inch ferrite motor reaches down to 60 Hz so playlists feel full even without a dedicated sub in every zone.
definition: Transformer-equipped 6.5-inch coaxial loudspeaker with multiple 70/100 V taps for distributed systems.
specs: Type: Passive loudspeaker with 70/100 V taps
Transducers: 6.5" coax ferrite woofer with 0.75" titanium tweeter
Spring terminals, ABS shell, white or black options
Dimensions 227 x 210 x 87 mm, weight 1.52 kg

lifestyle.alt: GC6T loudspeaker in front view with grille installed
GC6T units mounted along a corridor wall
Rear view of GC6T showing transformer housing and connections
Angled shot of the GC6T cabinet highlighting its shallow depth

name: KGEAR GC6
headline: Versatile 6.5-inch coaxial for commercial installs
description: A versatile 6.5-inch coaxial loudspeaker that anchors restaurants, mid-size venues and corporate spaces with clear, effortless sound.
story: GC6 offers a step up in output and low-frequency reach compared to smaller GC models while retaining a compact footprint. It is tuned for intelligible speech and smooth music reproduction, making it a reliable choice wherever a few loudspeakers need to cover a busy room.
definition: 6.5-inch coaxial loudspeaker for mid-size commercial and residential applications.
specs: Transducers: 6.5" coax ferrite woofer with 1" titanium dome tweeter
Binding post connectors, ABS enclosure, white or black finish
Dimensions 220 x 201 x 95 mm, weight 1.8 kg

lifestyle.alt: GC6 loudspeaker shown at an angle with grille fitted
GC6 loudspeakers installed along a restaurant wall
Close-up of the GC6 driver assembly behind the grille
GC6 cabinet viewed from the side to show its profile

name: KGEAR GC8I
headline: Premium 8-inch coaxial for flagship rooms
description: A premium 8-inch coaxial loudspeaker in a compact shell that delivers room-filling level with bass weight and refinement beyond its size.
story: GC8I is the top of the GC coax family, built for higher-SPL zones and more demanding listening spaces. The larger woofer and compression driver combination offers deeper low end and more commanding presence, making it a strong partner for GS subs in high-end hospitality and residential theatres.
definition: Premium 8-inch coaxial loudspeaker with extended bandwidth for high-performance commercial installations.
specs: Transducers: 8" coax ferrite woofer with 1.5" titanium compression driver
Professional binding posts, reinforced ABS shell
Dimensions 280 x 251 x 120 mm, weight 2.8 kg

lifestyle.alt: GC8I loudspeaker with its premium enclosure finish
GC8I mounted in a high-end interior environment
Close-up of the GC8I cone and coaxial driver assembly
Angled shot of GC8I showing cabinet proportions and edges

name: KGEAR GC8S
headline: 8-inch surface-mount coaxial loudspeaker
description: A surface-mount 8-inch coaxial loudspeaker that stands proudly in view, blending architectural presence with confident, weather-ready performance.
story: GC8S takes the sonic profile of GC8I into a robust surface-mount format for spaces where hardware is meant to be seen. The weather-resistant enclosure and wide coverage pattern make it suitable for industrial spaces, warehouses and covered outdoor areas that still demand articulate sound.
definition: 8-inch surface-mount coaxial loudspeaker for visible indoor and covered outdoor installations.
specs: Transducers: 8" coax ferrite woofer with 1.5" titanium compression driver
Dimensions 300 x 271 x 180 mm, weight 3.2 kg

lifestyle.alt: GC8S surface-mount cabinet on an exterior wall
GC8S used in a covered outdoor area with seating
Angled view of the GC8S cabinet and mounting bracket
Side profile of GC8S showing its mounting hardware and depth

name: KGEAR GF22
headline: Ultra-compact 2" architectural speaker
description: An ultra-compact 2-inch architectural loudspeaker that disappears into the design while gently bathing boutiques and lounges in airy background sound.
story: When near-invisibility is required without sacrificing audio quality, GF22 provides the solution with advanced transducer technology in a minimal footprint.
definition: Micro-architectural speaker with 2" driver for ultra-discrete installations.

name: KGEAR GF42 I
headline: 4" + 2" architectural point-source
description: A graceful 4-inch plus 2-inch two-way that brings gallery-smooth midrange and generous coverage to corporate, museum and retail spaces.
story: Professional architectural speaker that delivers audiophile-grade performance with the reliability needed for permanent installations.
definition: Two-way architectural speaker with 4" + 2" drivers for professional installations.
specs: Transducers: 4" ferrite woofer with 2" fabric dome tweeter
Dimensions 160 x 140 x 95 mm, weight 1.1 kg

name: KGEAR GF42A I
headline: Active 4" + 2" architectural speaker
description: An active 4-inch plus 2-inch architectural speaker that folds amplification and DSP inside the frame for clean walls and impeccably tuned rooms.
story: Active version of the GF42 I with onboard amplification, DSP, and multiple input options for maximum installation flexibility.
definition: Active two-way architectural speaker with integrated amplification and DSP control.
specs: Transducers: 4" woofer + 2" tweeter with 50 W Class-D amplification
Max SPL 110 dB with 140 deg coverage
Dimensions 180 x 160 x 110 mm, weight 1.8 kg

name: KGEAR GF42T I
headline: 4" + 2" with 70/100V transformer
description: A 70/100 V version of GF42 that threads long distributed lines with the same poised, intelligible character guests notice but never see.
story: Professional architectural speaker designed for commercial distributed audio systems requiring 70/100V operation.
definition: Two-way architectural speaker with integrated transformer for distributed audio.
specs: Transducers: 4" woofer + 2" tweeter with multi-tap transformer
Dimensions 180 x 160 x 110 mm, weight 1.5 kg

headline: 8" + 2" flagship architectural speaker
description: A flagship 8-inch plus 2-inch architectural point-source that anchors statement rooms with authoritative lows and unforced, natural presence.
story: Flagship architectural speaker that delivers audiophile-grade performance in challenging commercial environments requiring superior coverage and clarity.
definition: Premium two-way architectural speaker with 8" woofer for flagship installations.
specs: Transducers: 8" ferrite woofer with 2" compression driver
Premium mounting system with multiple angles
Dimensions 280 x 240 x 150 mm, weight 3.5 kg

name: KGEAR GF82A I
headline: Active 8" + 2" flagship architectural
description: An active flagship 8-inch plus 2-inch with integrated power and DSP, sculpting the room so music arrives balanced, composed and effortless.
story: Active flagship architectural speaker combining premium transducers with sophisticated amplification and DSP for the most demanding installations.
definition: Active flagship architectural speaker with 8" woofer and integrated amplification.
specs: Transducers: 8" woofer + 2" compression driver with 150 W Class-D
Max SPL 118 dB with 120 deg coverage
Dimensions 300 x 260 x 170 mm, weight 4.8 kg

name: KGEAR GF82T I
headline: 8" + 2" with 70/100V for distributed audio
description: A high-power 70/100 V variant that brings the GF82 timbre to airports, convention halls and vast public spaces with relaxed authority.
story: Premium architectural speaker engineered for large-scale distributed audio installations requiring exceptional performance and reliability.
definition: Flagship two-way speaker with high-power 70/100V transformer for distributed systems.
specs: Type: Premium speaker with high-power 70/100V transformer
Dimensions 300 x 260 x 170 mm, weight 4.2 kg

name: KGEAR GF162 I
headline: 16" + 2" architectural flagship powerhouse
description: A monumental 16-inch plus 2-inch architectural loudspeaker that carries low-end weight and vocal clarity deep into grand concourses and mega-venues.
story: The ultimate architectural speaker for applications demanding maximum SPL and low-frequency extension while maintaining installation flexibility.
definition: Ultra-high-performance architectural speaker with 16" woofer for flagship installations.
specs: Transducers: 16" ferrite woofer with 2" titanium compression driver
Dimensions 500 x 420 x 280 mm, weight 12.5 kg

name: KGEAR GF162T I
headline: 16" + 2" with ultra-high-power 70/100V
description: An ultra-high-power 16-inch plus 2-inch 70/100 V system that projects composed, full-range sound through the largest distributed networks.
story: Ultimate distributed audio speaker engineered for applications requiring maximum SPL and coverage from 70/100V systems.
definition: Ultra-performance speaker with 16" driver and ultra-high-power 70/100V transformer.
specs: Type: Ultra-performance speaker with ultra-high-power transformer
Dimensions 520 x 440 x 300 mm, weight 15.2 kg

name: KGEAR GH4
headline: 4" studio monitor for precision mixing
description: A compact 4-inch studio monitor that invites you in close, revealing mixes with honest detail and fatigue-free balance.
story: GH4 delivers studio-grade accuracy in a compact 4" format, perfect for nearfield monitoring and critical listening applications.
definition: Professional 4" studio monitor with precision drivers for critical listening.
specs: Max SPL 105 dB with precise imaging
Bi-amped design: 30 W woofer + 20 W tweeter
XLR and TRS inputs with level control
Dimensions 165 x 245 x 195 mm, weight 3.2 kg each

name: KGEAR GH4A
headline: Advanced 4" monitor with DSP control
description: An advanced 4-inch monitor with onboard DSP that gently corrects the room so your decisions stay consistent everywhere.
story: GH4A enhances the proven GH4 design with advanced DSP processing and room correction for ultimate monitoring accuracy.
definition: DSP-enhanced 4-inch studio monitor with advanced room correction capabilities.
specs: Transducers: 4" precision woofer + 1" silk dome tweeter
Max SPL 108 dB with room correction
Advanced DSP with room tuning presets
Dimensions 165 x 245 x 195 mm, weight 3.8 kg each

name: KGEAR GH4R
headline: 4" reference monitor for mastering
description: A reference-grade 4-inch monitor with extended bandwidth that captures the smallest nuance for mastering and critical listening.
story: GH4R represents the reference standard for 4" monitoring, engineered for mastering engineers and critical listening professionals.
definition: Reference-standard 4" monitor engineered for mastering and critical listening.
specs: Transducers: 4" reference woofer + 1" beryllium dome tweeter
Max SPL 110 dB with reference accuracy
Precision balanced inputs with reference level
Dimensions 165 x 245 x 195 mm, weight 4.1 kg each

name: KGEAR GH4RT
headline: 4" reference monitor with transformer coupling
description: A transformer-coupled 4-inch reference monitor that blends vintage input character with modern precision for truly personal monitoring.
story: GH4RT combines reference monitoring accuracy with transformer-coupled inputs for vintage character and modern precision.
definition: Reference 4" monitor with transformer-coupled inputs for vintage-modern character.
specs: Transducers: 4" reference woofer + 1" beryllium dome tweeter
Max SPL 110 dB with transformer character
Dimensions 165 x 245 x 195 mm, weight 4.5 kg each

name: KGEAR GH4LIVE
headline: 4" monitor optimized for live sound
description: A rugged 4-inch live monitor voiced for the stage, carrying clear cues and vocals across busy, energetic environments.
story: GH4LIVE adapts studio monitor precision for live sound applications with enhanced durability and stage-optimized tuning.
definition: Live-optimized 4-inch monitor with stage tuning and enhanced durability.
specs: Transducers: 4" tour-grade woofer + 1" titanium dome tweeter
Max SPL 112 dB with stage optimization
Dimensions 165 x 245 x 195 mm, weight 3.9 kg each

name: KGEAR GH412
headline: 4" + 12" sub monitor system
description: A complete system that marries compact 4-inch monitors with a dedicated 12-inch sub, wrapping detail and depth into one harmonious studio voice.
story: GH412 combines precision 4" monitoring with a dedicated 12" subwoofer for full-range studio monitoring in compact spaces.
definition: 4" + 12" subwoofer system for full-range studio monitoring.
specs: Subwoofer: 12" active sub with 150 W amplification
Crossover at 80 Hz with variable control
Individual satellite and sub level controls
System weight: satellites 6.4 kg, sub 18.5 kg

name: KGEAR GH8
headline: 8" studio monitor for midfield applications
description: A powerful 8-inch midfield monitor that reaches confidently into the low end while keeping the stereo picture steady and precise.
story: GH8 provides professional 8" midfield monitoring with extended frequency response and high SPL capability for larger studios.
definition: Professional 8" midfield monitor for larger studio applications.
specs: Max SPL 118 dB with midfield projection
Bi-amped design: 120 W woofer + 60 W tweeter
Multiple input options with level matching
Dimensions 285 x 445 x 325 mm, weight 12.8 kg each

name: KGEAR GH12
headline: 12" farfield monitor for large studios
description: A flagship 12-inch farfield monitor that stands at the edge of the room, projecting a wide, stable canvas for serious work.
story: GH12 delivers authoritative farfield monitoring with 12" low-frequency extension and precision imaging for critical mixing environments.
definition: Professional 12" farfield monitor for flagship studio applications.
specs: Max SPL 125 dB with farfield projection
Professional XLR inputs with calibrated levels
Advanced room correction and time alignment
Dimensions 385 x 585 x 425 mm, weight 28.5 kg each

description: A weather-ready 6.5-inch portable speaker that carries the party outdoors with an easy, musical voice and all-day stamina.
story: GG6 delivers exceptional outdoor performance with weather-resistant construction and powerful 6.5" drivers for portable applications.
definition: Weather-resistant 6.5" portable speaker for outdoor applications.
specs: Transducers: 6.5" marine-grade woofer + 1" titanium dome tweeter
Max SPL 110 dB with outdoor projection
Multiple input options with volume control
Dimensions 250 x 380 x 200 mm, weight 4.8 kg

name: KGEAR GT12
headline: 12" tower speaker for permanent installation
description: An elegant 12-inch three-way tower for permanent installs that draws the eye softly while anchoring the room with a confident, coherent voice.
story: GT12 provides exceptional point-source performance with 12" low-frequency extension in an elegant tower format for architectural installations.
definition: 12" tower speaker for premium architectural installations requiring point-source performance.
